reviews.review_text: My go to fav local take out spot! Food is great and authentic. Best place in the city to get fusion wraps. The food is mouthwatering and great quality. A must try for food lovers!! Definitely gonna order again Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sachin!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely 5 star! Rich flavours and excellent service! I ordered through Uber eats, it came with 2 full bowls, great portion! I phoned to make a modification, the staff was super helpful and made all changes for me. I appreciated for the excellent services. The Chick Peas was the best I had! Chicken was really fresh and tasty! Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Olivia! We greatly appreciate the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Me and 4 other girls ordered Uber eats for lunch and what a great lunch spot to try! We ordered: x3 Funky Chicken $16.95 (recommend) Cauli Sutra (Chickpea) $21.60 Buy 1 get 1 free (recommend) Pacific Prawn Star $16.90  (recommend) All 3 dishes were super tasty, fresh and well balanced! You get rice under the pickled veggies and salad, the chicken and prawns were juicy and warm still and give a nice middle eastern taste. In the whole bowl you pretty much get a little bit of everything, sweet from the pomegranates, savoury from the chicken, spicy from the jalapenos, tangy from the pickled veggies and a good balance of rice and that great wet sauce on top! Overall highly recommend trying this place out, you won t regret!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Aliz for powering you lunch with us! We love the details you shared here

reviews.review_text: These bowls are absolutely delicious. Super fresh and healthy tasting!  I ordered 2 funky chicken bowls, the chicken was super moist, tender and flavourful. The bowl consisted a lot of variety of veggies, which added lots of crunch, colour, substance and texture. The sauce that was drizzled through out was zesty and refreshing and it helped tie it in all together. Super friendly and fast service too! Great portions, highly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Amanda for the kind words and taking the time to write a review. Customers like you keep us motivated to give our best. We believe in providing exceptional organic food quality and make our own dressings. We appreciate your rating.

reviews.review_text: This was so delicious!! I was so full but I wanted to keep eating. Next time Ill get the extra sauce on the side so the veggies dont get too soggie when I save it for later. Highly recommend this place, it is pricer than other places but the size you get can be worth 2 meals. The chick peas were so savory and the chicken I cant wait to come back again Take my money ~ Only down side, the location is far :( Vegetarian options: Different vegetable options and prepared ones as well Kid-friendliness: The mall is generally kid friendly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for all your love, Sandra! We really appreciate your feedback about the sauces and will keep it mind to make the freshness last longer. We also have deals with Uber eats and too good to go! Both give you great options to save more and enjoy more :) Happy Holidays!

reviews.review_text: My wife and I recently had the pleasure of dining at a remarkable restaurant during our 10-day stay in Canada, and its safe to say that this dining experience was the highlight of our trip. This culinary gem, which we wholeheartedly recommend to all fellow food enthusiasts, is none other than the restaurant where we indulged in the freshest, healthiest, and most delectable dishes weve ever had the pleasure of savoring. The restaurants ambiance was cozy and welcoming, creating the perfect atmosphere for a memorable dining experience. However, what truly sets this place apart is its commitment to serving healthy yet incredibly delicious food. We were pleasantly surprised to discover an extensive menu filled with a variety of options to cater to various dietary preferences. As health-conscious individuals, we couldnt have been more delighted. One of the standout dishes we had the pleasure of trying was the Grizzlys Catch. This seafood masterpiece was a true culinary delight. The perfectly seared fish was tender, flaky, and bursting with flavor. The accompanying fresh vegetables and light drizzle of sauce complemented the dish perfectly, making it a must-try for any seafood lover. Another absolute winner was the Yogis Paradise. This vegetarian dish was a symphony of flavors and textures. The combination of perfectly grilled tofu, sauteed vegetables, and a mouthwatering sauce made this dish an explosion of taste in every bite. It was a pleasant surprise even for us, non-vegetarians, and it showcased the restaurants mastery in creating dishes that cater to all palates. One of the most remarkable aspects of our dining experience was the exceptional service provided by Chef Ankit. His passion for food was palpable, and he went above and beyond to ensure that we were not only well-fed but also educated about each dishs preparation. His detailed explanations and friendly demeanor added a personal touch to our meal, making it all the more special. In addition to the incredible food and service, we were also impressed by the restaurants commitment to using fresh, locally sourced ingredients. It was evident that quality and health were top priorities in every dish they prepared. Our journey in Canada would not have been complete without this culinary adventure, and for that, we are deeply grateful to Chef Ankit and the entire restaurant team. We wholeheartedly recommend this establishment to anyone visiting the area. Whether youre a health-conscious diner or simply in search of a fantastic meal, this restaurant is a must-visit. Thank you for making our trip truly memorable!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time and write this lovely review, Dhiraj. We had a wonderful time serving you and your wife.

reviews.review_text: oh my GOODNESSSSSSS!!! (pun intended) I have stumbled upon my redemption.  The best most healthiest food in a bowl of Love. Found this weird little mall at the corner of Abbott and Keefer (Cineplex Odeon and the Catfe are there too)...thought Id check out their food court and see if there was anything up there that I SHOULD be eating...as opposed to what I HAVE been eating (Chocolate and Popcorn, lol) In front of me lies an unassuming little counter with a woman in the back cooking and prepping.  As I read through the crazy amount of healthy ingredients I can put into a bowl, I am relieved to have found them and cant wait to put my order together. It is Hard for me to cook for myself and I dont get all the variety or quality of food that my body needs.  This was fast food the right way.  Healthy and Organic. The woman behind the counter, Meet (who had already spent most of her day cooking and prepping all the delicious choices) helped me put together a custom bowl. With a base of cauli/quinoa/kale, I added beautiful chicken chunks and flavorful tofu, chickpeas, beetroot,spinach, brocolli, carrots, crunchy lentils and a very happy sauce to blend it all together. I am home now eating it and it is So Dang GOOD!!!  I have enough for 3 or 4 meals (got the large bowl).  And I know every meal will be nutritious, delicious and filling. The service was the best, I was made to feel so special! I am in the area for a month, and Ojas (and Meet) will be my new best friends. Color me Grate-ful!   :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, Deb, Weve never had such a lovely review! Thank you for trying our food and taking the time to share this amazing experience with the world We love to hear that we will be part of your stay, we now have soups and Chai to keep you warm and strong during these colder months. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: Such a fantastic place to quickly get a healthy salad downtown! This place is amazing: you build your own salad by selecting a base, a sauce, proteins, toppings, and a crunch. Great value for money.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for stopping by Anny!

reviews.review_text: If you look at my previous reviews, you can see that I only place a review for a place that I feel passionately for. Ojas blends is one of those places. Not many places can get their Paneer to be the right texture, or have a huge selection of yummy and healthy foods. This place also has good customer service because I am a little indecisive and they never show any annoyance when I am having a hard time. I hope they keep this quality and service up forever.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Komal! We re very happy to read your review.

reviews.review_text: Wow, this place is incredible. Truly a hidden gem. Loved both bowls ive tried so far. You wont regret ordering. Portions are great, ingredients are fresh and healthy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your rating with us and the community. We are grateful for your 5-star review.

reviews.review_text: Good value with the UberEats BOGO promotion. Taste is decent, portion size is good, and ingredients seem fresh. Personally wouldn t order without the BOGO promotion though.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love an honest review! Brendan rest assured that our ingredients are fresh and our flavours are unique We created the BOGO Uber eats promotion to reach as many friends as we could and were happy to hear that its working!

reviews.review_text: I ordered the Funky Chicken Bowl with the curry sauce. Does not disappoint! Ive tried many curry flavoured items in downtown Vancouver and theyre all very... westernized. This hit the spot with all the spices. Plus the ingredients were fresh. Loved every bite. Thank you for such a delicious meal!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear,  We greatly appreciate the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Ordered a bogo deal through Ubereats and was happily surprised at how lovely the flavours in the funky chicken bowl are! Im glad I didnt order a pizza and went with this healthy choice, generous portion and good price if you get a deal, come pick it up or are just in the area. Service was also really polite and friendly!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive review, Sandra! We are glad to hear this.

reviews.review_text: I love Indian, Middle Eastern and Italian cuisines (who doesnt xD? - like really...), which I think this place is inspired by My lifestyle is vegan - so I need options, and I sometimes (more like always) want a lot of that food, and when I eat a lot of food I obviously need my space, since I am not sure I like sharing my meal, especially when its that delicious - one of the reasons why dine in is not my always choice So I saw some of my vegan Facebook groups members shared this location earlier and decided to come give it a try They had variety of by-default vegan options, as well as those which could be customized, I asked for Holy Tofu Curls - the portion was exactly the way I needed (ok wanted as well), I could take it home since its a bowl (the dining area wasnt too busy, so I decided to stay), and hey - my stomach was feeling very fulfilled, light at the same time and those flavours are definitely brining me back Thank you guys! <3
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Nick, you took us on a journey with this review and we loved it! Thanks a lot for sharing your experience with us

reviews.review_text: I have been working late most nights so taking advantage of their BOGO the funky chicken bowl has become my go to meals. Healthy, delicious and really well proportioned. I never feel too full nor hungry after eating. Hands down has become my favorite spot in Vancouver to order from on UberEATS thats healthy and delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Antonie! We greatly appreciate the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Just tried this for the first time and I LOVE IT!!! I was looking for a healthier delivery option with lotsa veggies and this was totally it. Ordered 2 for 1 Cauli Sutra bowls with extra sauce and they are INCREDIBLE!! Also since the bowls are pretty big I now have 4 delicious full meals. Will definitely order again! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This is music to our ears Victoria! Thank you for giving us a chance to bring you health and tons of flavors Please keep coming back! Maybe next time give our Holy Tofu Bowl a try, you ll love it

reviews.review_text: Ordered this amazing bowl. Has an incredible harmony between taste and surface, and everythings because of the extraordinary stuffing; every one of the ideal parts were cooked and prepared amazingly. A must try, and yes it was Yogis Paradise. Loved It.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Puneet! We are glad to hear the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Just had for first time. My bowl was excellent. Ingredients are good, portion fair, price fair. A decent walk for me, but given the nice weather, I am happy to make my down to try more from them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kevin for making us part of your summer routine! We can wait to see you again

reviews.review_text: The fusion of Indian and continental flavors in the bowl was delightful, and both the quantity and quality of the food were exceptional. Vegetarian options: Customized options available
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot, Shraddha!

reviews.review_text: They have a deal Uber eats that has saved countless nights (2x1) they are open later than most restaurants in the area and the portions are very generous. I really love this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sahil, were so happy every time we see your name on the screen! Thank you for supporting us.

reviews.review_text: I feel at home whenever Im at Ojas Blend restaurant,  well trained staff, so friendly, welcoming people, untomatically makes the food tasty, you always want to stay behind and order more but the stomach wont allow you .The taste of the food remains in the mouth. Keep it up guys. Ojas Blend is a great place to go whenever youre in Vancouver..Bravo Vegetarian options: They have variety, best selection  ,
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Youre very kind Tony, We love to have you around. Thank you for your kind words, we hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: AMAZING EXPERIENCE! Such friendly customer service. Went above and beyond. The food itself was fresh and well seasoned and all house made. Very impressed. Good portion size too. Great for if you re vegan but also have good non vegan options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Chelseigh, Thank you for lovely words! We hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: Wow, I finally ordered from here. I got the funky chicken bowl. It was so delicious! I cant wait to try the other items there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Rie! We are so excited for you to keep trying our our menu. Thank you for letting us know how much you liked it! We suggest you try our Pranalisious bowl next, you won t be disappointed

reviews.review_text: They have a deal Uber eats that has saved countless nights (2x1) they are open later than most restaurants in the area and the portions are very generous. I really love this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chetan, Thank you for your lovely review, we are happy to know that you are choosing to stay healthy even with those long nights!

reviews.review_text: Really like this place! Healthy and fresh meals, vegan and gluten free options! Decent portions and filling, lots of protein. Really unique ingredient combinations. Bogo deals on UberEats quite often which is even more of a great deal, or half price bowls on TooGoodToGo app (pictured), you get a mishmash of stuff but they pack it full!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your amazing review! We are pleased to hear that you liked our bowls. Our priority is to value our customers, so we keep on introducing new deals. It is good to hear that you keep on ordering food from us through different platforms.

reviews.review_text: 10/10 recommend! I ve been living off of their funky chicken bowl with extra sauce, it s ridiculously good. Healthy, quality ingredients, great portions, it s a MUST try
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mr.Matt ward, we appreciate your kind words and promise to keep providing good meals packed with intense flavours. Thank you

reviews.review_text: Amazing make your own bowls, with vegan options. The veggies were super fresh and the hummus super smooth. Highly recommend! Vegetarian options: Soy curls hummus Dietary restrictions: Vegan and gluten free options
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Heather! We cant wait to see you again

reviews.review_text: I went to Ojas Blend on my lunch break. I cant eat spicy food, so I was a little bit concerned. A girl who was working made me delicious food according to my dietary needs. Ojas Blend has delicious food, great service and amazing value! I will be back for sure. Vegetarian options: great menu Dietary restrictions: they are able to accommodate your request Parking: free parking in the mall for 2 hours Wheelchair accessibility: wheelchair accessible
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Martina, thank you for your visit! We had lots of fun creating something for you.

reviews.review_text: Helping people live longer with their healthy, tasty, and affordable food. Thank you for being there! Unique / Unmatched. p.s. Free couple-hour parking in the mall basement.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: You just made our day Petre! We re so happy and humbled read this. Thank YOU for being there!

reviews.review_text: Love coming here! Tasty, very flavourful bowls made with fresh ingredients. Excellent vegetarian options. Service is always good as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Erika!

reviews.review_text: One of the best restaurant in Vancouver and in International village. Highly recommended. And their behaviour is too much good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mainul, thank you for sharing all this lovely words. We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Delicious. My go to is the butter chicken with naan bread and it never disappoints. Always hot and flavourful. Would recommend this spot before any other food court option.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your words Heimdal! We love to see you around

reviews.review_text: Delicious healthy bowls. The cashier (owner?) was very patient with our questions (we designed our own bowls x2) and the food tasted fresh. Sauces are creative. However, there was a bone in the smoked salmon but it might be a one-off (?). Overall, we would go back :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Clara for taking the time to leave us a 5 star rating - its much appreciated! It is good you highlighted for the Salmon, will double check it. We will love your revisit.

reviews.review_text: Good food (butter chicken self select combo) Good service - friendly and very patiently explaining the steps for ordering and ingredients Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Reasonable portion size and really good discounts on delivery apps! The ingredients are super fresh, hecking love this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Cecil!

reviews.review_text: Ordered funky chicken subbed rice for salad greens. I cant handle spicy foods but I still ate the whole bowl because they were so generous with the meat. The bowl was colourful, fresh, visually appealing, flavourful, and decent portion size (salads arent usually filling but this was enough). My mouth was burning a bit but Id come back and try more dishes in the future. Great for people who want to eat healthier or on low-carb/keto.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Elena for the wonderful review. Next time when you visit please ask for low spice option. We are sure you will like our other bowls too.

reviews.review_text: Ojas did a fantastic job catering 50+ people for our work event. The food was so good we forgot to take picture. The presentation was beautiful. Im definitely coming back and will recommend them to anyone. Cant seem to add pictures so I guess Ill have to visit again :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Tanziha. We re very happy to hear that we share the same passion for food and that you had a great experience with us! Even we had a good experience catering your event. Yes! Please do visit our store too. We will really appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: Ive had a few takeout orders from them, Im a big fan. Everything is fresh and keeps well, I have been taking these bowls to work out of province and they survive travelling on the plane/in the car for an entire day and then a day or two in the hotel fridge just fine - the leftovers are still excellent on day 3. They dont strike me as low calorie but seem to be pretty nutritious and balanced with protein, rice, different veggies, a fatty dressing, and often some other grain/legume like chickpeas. Have not visited the actual store yet.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Thanks for your review. We appreciate you took the time to review our food. We have another venture too, where we make meals as per the calorie intake, please try https://fitmunkeys.com/ Also, we share healthy advice and nutritional value of each food on our page: https://www.instagram.com/ojasblend/ I am sure ,you will like this page!! Again, thanks for the review.

reviews.review_text: Never been to their actual location, I usually order on uber with their BOGO. Their bowls are really good and super healthy and good value. The funky chicken is my fave
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lex! Thank you for your feedback. We have a brand new location in White Rock too, come say hi whenever you re in town

reviews.review_text: The new White Rock South Surrey location has become my new favorite spot   staff is super friendly an the food an shakes couldnt be better!! Its a must for anyone visiting or local to beautiful White Rock South Surrey
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Miss Yvanna, were very happy to be in town! Looking forward to our first summer in White Rock, lots more freshness to come.

reviews.review_text: After moving to a new office, I was thrilled to have come across Ojas, my new go-to lunch spot. I got a two-for-one special on the Funky Chicken bowl. Its super flavourful, fresh, satisfying and healthy to boot. I popped my second one in the fridge and had it the next day...just as good, if not even better! The bowl is packed tight and to the brim; definitely bang for your buck!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Suzy for leaving us a wonderful review.

reviews.review_text: This is the best Indian fusion food I ever had. I was simply amazing. Do try them
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Amandeep for taking the time to leave us this amazing review.

reviews.review_text: DELICIOUS FRESH food. Ive got their Funky chicken bowl twice 2x and me and my friend loved it every time. Fresh vegetable and perfectly cooked chicken! Im about to order from them again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Milad! Our chefs put it all out creating this bowl and they re joy-dancing in the kitchen after hearing your feedback. Did you know we also have a wrap version of it? Its a hit in its own way! We re looking forward to your next order

reviews.review_text: Ordered it one night on Uber eats because of what seemed like their smokin deal. Was thoroughly impressed, ordered it the next night as a takeout to save a couple bucks. Didn t realize the price wasn t really a discount, the price just is that good. In a world where a bowl costs you 20$ for a bowl, try half that for the same thing. Portion size is also good!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Michel, Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our priority is to provide healthy & tasty bowls at a reasonable price. Kind folks like you make our work a pleasure.

reviews.review_text: Omg this place is soooo fresh and tasty.  My son had the butter chicken bowl which was great and my friend got the cauli-sutra with chicken bowl and it was soooo DELICIOUS!! The ingredients are so fresh and the spices are so good!! The bowls are big we shared both bowls between 3 of us and it was only $10.99 per bowl. We will for sure be going back every time we go downtown for a game etc.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Crystal!! It sounds like you enjoyed our butter chicken and cauli-sutra bowls. We are so happy to hear that the taste and freshness were up to par with your expectations. We take pride in the quality of our food and hope that we can continue delivering great-tasting bowls. We will appreciate your revisit. You can follow our page for the latest discounts and updates: https://www.instagram.com/ojasblend

reviews.review_text: Never liked the salads, bowls and healthy stuff, but Ojas changed my mindset. Their bowls are healthy and delicious a rare combo. The prices are very affordable compared to the quality of food. Staff are friendly and polite always.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Pradeep! We greatly appreciate the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: This is one of my all time favourite places to order from. i have never had bad food or experience from staff. Always amazing service, great price and the food is amazing and fresh. I order from here all the time and have put so many of my friends onto this place. Genuinely an amazing establishment!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review. At Ojas, customer service and food quality is the priority.  We appreciate you for being a regular customer and referring us.

reviews.review_text: Really tasty and healthy bowls. Must try Definitely recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Aman! We are glad to hear the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Always fresh ingredients love their charred chicken! Really good service and have been loving this place for a while. It is vegan friendly with a lot of variety and tasty tasty recipes I would 100% recommend to anyone who wants a healthy meal or just a meal in general.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Taiga Nakamura, we thank you your kind words and for  appreciating our efforts to bring healthy and tasty options for everyone, we have new menu items coming soon. Thank you

reviews.review_text: Wonderful experience & yummy food! She was extremely patient with me (I asked a million questions & she answered with a smile)   very flavourful and my tummy is happy
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Katie for your wonderful words, it makes us happy to give you the excellence you deserve!

reviews.review_text: Ordered from Uber eats and really loved the yogic bowl I had. So spicy and well flavoured. Was amazing w the lamb!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sarah! So good to read this. Were always here for you, thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you loved our bowls. Please tell you family and friends to hit us up!

reviews.review_text: Had the funky chicken and I must admit this was really surprising and so impressive! This is a very unique fusion of desi cuisine and health conscious concept of Pacific NW bowls. I think the genius behind this idea is really onto something and this would sell well at Universities. Great job guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Sanjay! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic food ere. I had the pleasure of having a few of their meals, each dish was fresh and vibrant. You feel full without feeling heavy. The staff are great and every meal is made to order. Great spot for some great food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Joseph for leaving us a wonderful review. We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our staff will definitely be happy to read what you wrote.

reviews.review_text: Dont be deceived by the location; its actually really good. The food makes you feel full, but doesnt make you feel guilty, since it seems quite healthy. Each of the bowls are quite different, but each one tastes amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive review!

reviews.review_text: Big fan of funky chicken bowl and specials by the chef. Most deliciously healthy restaurant in Vancouver. The quality of vegetables is amazing. The meat and sauces makes it the tasty and wholesome meal.

reviews.review_text: Very good, ordered the tandoori bowl. Came out like a restaurant quality dish. Naan bread was great, thick and tasty.

reviews.review_text: Butter chicken wrap is huge and has lots of veggies and butter chicken. The bowls are amazing too I like the funky chicken.

reviews.review_text: Th portions were surprisingly large and I highly recommend the funky chicken bowl! So flavourful and often on BOGO deal on Uber eats !!!

reviews.review_text: I loved the food. It is full of delicious flavours and the portion size is good too. The bowls look very appealing and they are very tasty

reviews.review_text: Awesome bowls, very healthy and great price! GF and DF options.

reviews.review_text: Ordered on Uber eats and it came well packed. So delicious, would definitely order again. The truffle yogurt is so good.

reviews.review_text: consistently healthy, super high quality and now open late?? absolutely love Ojas Blend and i m here in a weekly basis.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Andrew! We love yo see you! Thanks for the review. We have your back on those late nights

reviews.review_text: Ordered a Prana-lisious bowl for delivery cause they had a BOGO deal on Uber eats, it was so so good! It was hard to choose but I am planning on trying all of the bowls

reviews.review_text: New place in food court , was curious as I live attach to the mall ! Was absolutely amazing , so good I went the next day for the same bowl !feeling the fresh ingredients! Good job and keep it up
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Mathieu for leaving us a wonderful review. We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our staff will definitely be happy to read what you wrote.

reviews.review_text: GREAT bowls! Taste so good  and great portion -  super filling! Will for sure order again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our bowl. If you like to know more about us or want to get some healthy lifestyle tips, check our profile: https://www.instagram.com/ojasblend/

reviews.review_text: I have been to thus restaurant 5 times now and the food is delicious and healthy! If you are looking to feel good and energized after your meal instead of tired and sluggish, then this is the place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Maneesh! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: We are ordering once a week and enjoying it every time  . The portion are big and its very fresh. Thank you Guys
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank YOU SuperQuitterie! There s nothing better than knowing that we are part of your weekly rotation

reviews.review_text: Very friendly people. Great portions of ingredients and yummy taste! Everything on the menu looks great. Would dine again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Alex. Your review matters to us. We always keep balance between healthy ingredients and taste.

reviews.review_text: This is a great little place with fresh yummy veggie bowls, tucked between the usual food court fare serving fried meats. Very glad I tried it and will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Kaywin! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: Eating here was a coincidence but one of the best ones, my guy here made the most bomb bowl I ve ever had, definitely coming back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great words. We will love your revisit to the store.

reviews.review_text: Been having these bowls for a while now. Always fresh and organic. The portions are large too :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Gulshirin, for your kind words and being a regular customer. We aim to satisfy each customer by providing the best food quality and portion. We will love to see you again.

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and excellent service! I ordered the Funky Chicken Bowl and it was so flavourful. I will definitely be back for more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Supreet  thank you for this amazing comment, we will be looking forward to serve you again.

reviews.review_text: The  calisutra  bowl is my favourite.Always fresh and a healthy alternative.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: SM thats right! Thank you for the love

reviews.review_text: hearty, healthy vegan bowls. highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Youre the best Alana! Thanks a lot for your review

reviews.review_text: I have never ordered from Ojas , this was my first experience, I tried the funky chicken it was fresh and delicious. Would definitely order again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Aleysha! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: Tried it through delivery using UberEATS Really good taste and flavour combinations Food was fresh and well presented I would like a bit more sauce on the food or possibly on the side. Keep up the good work !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hunar Mancoo, thank you for supporting us and we ll add a little more sauce in your bowl,according to your preference. Tha k you Again

reviews.review_text: I did not expect this, best bowl I have had so far in vancouver, and I am a bowl lover, tried every single spot. Definitely value for money.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive review, Kirandeep! We are glad to hear this.

reviews.review_text: They helped me select a mean to suite my many allergies. The food was delicious and filling. Dietary restrictions: Soy free Dairy free Gluten free
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Esther! We hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite restaurant in Vancouver. I wish I could give this place 10 stars since they have that consistent 2 for 1 deal with even more amazing food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing excellent review. We aim to provide healthy and delicious meals at reasonable price. Your good review and love keep us motivated.

reviews.review_text: Love this place! Im surprised how fresh the food is. Super healthy, flavorful, and guilt-free food! Will definitely order from this place again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robin K, i am glad that people like you understanding the concept of healthy, fuller, flavourful and guilt free eating could be a thing, thank you for writing and supporting us.

reviews.review_text: Delicious food with high quality ingredients! Great portion size. Will definitely order again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Lisa! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: Awesome place with friendly and helpful staff. The butter chicken bowl is fantastic here. definitely recommend trying it out
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Pradeep, thank you for your kind expression towards our food. We appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the butter chicken and tandoori bowl too. Can t wait sit to visit new White Rock location!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Jane for leaving us a wonderful review.

reviews.review_text: Tried this place once and now I m addicted!! The bowls are so fresh and tasty, and they have so many options for vegans/vegetarians :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Kismat for leaving us a wonderful review.

reviews.review_text: You guys have a really good business, the food is well portioned, delicious and so fresh, you deserve all 5 stars. Keep up the great work
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Warren. We feel more motivated when customers like you spend the time to write such a great review.

reviews.review_text: I tried Culi sutra. Food was delicious Everything was perfectly cooked. It s healthy and has reasonable price. I will recommend you guys must try it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Danish for giving us best rating! We focus on serving healthy food at reasonable price. Thank you for the great review.

reviews.review_text: OMG! I Love it ! Their food are AMAZING So delicious and fresh with beautiful design I wish I could rate them 7 stars !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Kiyana!

reviews.review_text: I order from here at least once a week as I love their food - tasty, healthy and good portion / size.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive review, Jonathan! We are glad to hear this.

reviews.review_text: THE BEST BOWL I HAVE EVER HAD IN VANCOUVER!! They are so unique and full of flavour, I strongly recommend it to anyone out there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing to hear, Laura! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

reviews.review_text: Great service, fanastic food, excellent value. Fresh, tasty and big portions! Recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review!  Your satisfaction is our priority, and as affirmed by your review, we pride ourselves on our exceptional food quality and portion.

reviews.review_text: The food here is so delicious and healthy. Highly recommended. Yum!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love to see you happy and healthy! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we really appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: Very Friendly and excellent behaviour.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mohammad, we can t give anything less when we have such great customers like you!

reviews.review_text: Best food court food ive ever had! i will come again next time for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Brian. We would love to see you during the next visit.

reviews.review_text: Not only is it healthy, but it tastes the best   They are kind too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Eunhong! We re very happy when you comer around

reviews.review_text: Love this place, good service and the food was awesome
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Bora! We are glad to hear this.

reviews.review_text: Healthy, tasty, rich in protein, and great quantity food for only 12 bucks. Loved it
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Karen! We are thrilled to hear the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Ojas catered for the summer party at my workplace. The food was exquisite!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Alice for the wonderful words. Please visit our store and try our other food items, we are sure you will like that too. We are located in Downtown Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: Food they offer is quite rich in quality as well as price is really cheap.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Gourav, thank you for sharing your thoughts with us!

reviews.review_text: Very good and healthy, really like the food it was my best experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Harmanjit! We are thrilled to hear the positive feedback.

reviews.review_text: Loved the food, amazing Environment. a nice place to hangout with friends
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Rashid. We are grateful that you took the time out to leave us a review.
